amendment.description: Amendment sought to prohibit the use of funds for the U.S. China Clean Energy Research Center.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit the use of funds to be used for the U.S. China Clean Energy Research Center.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Rohrabacher amendment (A044) Failed by recorded vote: 181 - 229 (Roll no. 319).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
